import "./App.css"; import Navbar from "./navbar.js"; import React, { Component } from "react"; class Cart extends Component { render() { return (

Cart

{/* left hand side of page */}
{this.props.cartItems.map((item, index) => (

{item.name}

{item.price}
Color: {item.color}
Fill: {item.fill}
{ this.props.RemoveFromCart(index); }} > Remove all from cart
))}{" "}
{/* right hand side of page -- text */}

ORDER SUMMARY

Subtotal
$89
Shipping estimate
Free
Tax estimate
$4.57
ESTIMATED TOTAL
$93.57
); } } export default Cart;
